name: Chatwoot Webhook
description: This module creates two webhook endpoints that allows you to integrate botpress with Chatwoot.
author: ReinMengelberg

scripts.dockerBuild: sudo docker run -v "$PWD:/botpress/modules/custom_module" --rm botpress/module-builder:v0_0_2 sh -c 'cd /botpress/modules/custom_module && yarn && yarn build && yarn package'
